Honolulu.Vintage Cave Club: The Vintage Cave Club (formerly Vintage Cave Honolulu) is a French-Japanese and sushi restaurant in the Ala Moana Center in Honolulu, Hawaii. The restaurant contains a collection of artwork that includes a lithograph series by Pablo Picasso. The restaurant is currently open to the public, but boasts an optional, soon to be required membership fee of up to $500,000.
